cells.data:
Aww Bullocks

#### Inputs

Never Empty Array
Alway Integer


##### Challenge 1

Return new array with all consecutive like values summed

[1, 3, 4, 4, 9, 0] => [1, 3, 8, 9, 0]


##### Challenge 2

Given an array and a starting edge and an ending edge sum consecutive like numbers, if there are numbers that are also like prior to the starting edge go back and add those in as well (given [1,1,1,2,2,2] and a starting edge with index 1 and an ending edge with index 4 return [3,6]


       S=2         E=6
       |           |
[2, 1, 1, 1, 4, 3, 6, 6, 1] => [3, 4, 3, 6]


Start / End = Edge


##### Challenge 3

Fold all consequtives until none


[2, 4, 2, 2, 3, 5, 1, 1, 1, 3] 
 => [2, 4, 4, 3, 5, 3, 3]
   => [2, 8, 3, 5, 6]

##### Challenge 4

Return Range preserving start/end across folds


       S=2            E=7
       |              |
[0, 2, 1, 1, 3, 5, 3, 3, 6, 1]      
         ___|        |___
  => [0, 2, 2, 3, 5, 6, 6, 1]
    => [0,4, 3, 5, 12, 1]
